data.title: Wedding DJs in Richmond & Event MCs
data.meta_description: Let loose with your favorite songs & dance the night away. Voted Best Wedding DJs in Richmond. DJ services for Richmond, Charlottesville, and Central Virginia. VA ceremony and reception entertainment.
data.text:
Get ready to let loose, sing at the top of your lungs, and spend all night dancing. That’s what our Richmond-based wedding and event DJs live for! We’ll make sure you and your guests have the best time. EVER.

How often have you been to a ho-hum wedding reception, feeling like you’ve heard the same old playlist before? The right mix of music can make or break your reception or special occasion.

We’ll work in concert to create just the right blend of your favorites, important “first” songs, and crowd-pleasers sure to pack the dance floor.

As winners of The Knot’s Best of Weddings Hall of Fame and WeddingWire’s Couples’ Choice Awards, our DJs know how to bring the party to Richmond and surrounding Central Virginia.

Frank was great to meet with us before the wedding to make sure we felt good about everything. He also did the lighting at The Jefferson and it was beautiful! I would absolutely recommend Bunn DJ Company and Frank Guertler!

This company is who you need to be booking with 100%! We were able to dance the night away and all of our family and friends had an awesome time! We received many compliments! What a great company! Hands down – Five stars!

Looking for a DJ in the Richmond or Central VA area? Let me help you. I’m Frank Guertler of Bunn DJ Company Virginia and I’ll match you up with the perfect DJ/MC.

Together, we’ll find the one who has the personality, experience, and expertise that’s right for your special occasion.

As a popular DJ company in Richmond, VA, we work at the top venues in the area. You can count on us to design a seamless event timeline for success, whether you’re looking for a wedding DJ, corporate event DJ, or private party DJ such as a birthday, milestone celebration, family reunion, or retirement.

Music is key to a memorable wedding or event. But so is keeping to the timeline (and knowing how to adjust), making important announcements to your guests, and pronouncing everyone’s name correctly. Bunn DJ Company Virginia DJs can do all that – and play the perfect song at the right time.

Your DJ sets the tone for the occasion. Complete the vibe with DJ uplighting that transforms the atmosphere of any venue. From exciting to chill, glamorous to boho, lighting accentuates the features of any room and creates the mood.
